Articles.Content:
Greetings to anyone living in Manchester.

I, and the rest of the KSP community hope you are all ok, and your families are too after the attack last night.

No im not, but i have respect. 

For the rest, i wont get deeper on the attack, this might turn into a politcal megathreadmess and thats not what we want, keep the forum safe.

BTW i congratulate Manchester for beating Ajax in footballsoccer too!
